task.title: Enable Login Using a Facebook Account
task.shortdesc: Connect your Facebook account to Livefyre to allow users to use their Facebook logins to interact with Apps on your site.

context.p: To enable login using a Facebook account:

step.cmd: Switch the Enable Login with Facebook toggle to ON.
